title: [CRASH] redis crashed at start
body:
**Crash report**

redis used to run. I recently updated the OS from OpenBSD 7.1 to 7.4

```
A key '__redis__compare_helper' was added to Lua globals which is not on the globals allow list nor listed on the deny list.
 Running mode=standalone, port=6379.
Server initialized
=== REDIS BUG REPORT START: Cut & paste starting from here ===
Redis 6.2.7 crashed by signal: 11, si_code: 2
```

comments_data.body: An update of redis fixed the issue
